body_html: @xuxianju Same here. Both 1.0 and 1.1 require cudnn5.1, so if 1.0 works, I'd expect 1.1 to load and work as well. But it doesn't. Were you able to fix this? I had to downgrade and stay with 1.0, which is not nice, since we have the 1.4 release now. And all the releases 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 1.4 fail to import with these meaningless messages like in your log. Have no idea how to debug it. The script says "failed to import", but everything else is fine, "all required dlls appear to be present".
